definition:
For any cardinal $\kappa$, *Martin’s Axiom for $\kappa$* ($MA_\kappa$)
states that if $P$ is a partial order satisfying ccc then given any set
of $\kappa$ subsets of $P$, there is a subset intersecting each such
subset. *Martin’s Axiom* states that $MA_\kappa$ holds for every
$\kappa<2^{\aleph_0}$.
